data.title: Jintong Lingzi Company signed a 39.325 million yuan contract is the company's first (set) project in the electric cold storage and electric heat storage subdivision industry.
data.meta_description: JiangsuJintongling Energy Storage Technology Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Jin Tongling, and Nantong Sijian Group Co., Ltd., signed the contract for the Integration of High-efficiency Electric Energy Storage and waste Heat recovery Air-conditioning system in the production Command Center of Zhongtian Iron and Steel Green Fine Steel Project on March 4, 2022, with a tentatively estimated total price of RMB 39.325 million. This project is the first (set) project of Jin Tongling in the subdivision of electric cold storage and electric heat storage industry. it plays a positive role in the development of Jin Tongling in the energy storage industry and will further promote the development of regional green energy, green industry and green consumption.
